div.p: This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/wh-payer-subscriber-relationship defines the following codes:

tr.td: The beneficiary can only be identified as a child or other dependent of the Subscriber.

title.value: Health Data Connect Subscriber Relationship Codes

description.value: Health Data Connect subscriber relationship value set for the relationship of the member to the contract holder
